      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17031480">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031480">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031480">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951112">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951112" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17031481">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031481">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031481">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031481">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17031481" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17031482">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031482">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031482">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Where can I go to brainstorm on and narrow a topic, or find a list of recommended sources?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031482">
          <div id="boxatt17031482" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20078717">
              <a id="link_20078717" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20078717,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20078720">
              <a id="link_20078720" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20078720,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344702}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20078741">
              <a id="link_20078741" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search~S0?/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/tencyclopedia+of+mexico/1,1,2,B/frameset&amp;FF=tencyclopedia+of+mexico+history+society+and+culture&amp;2,,2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20078741,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20078113}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Mexico
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20556808">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20556808">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20556808">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Where can I find literary biographical sketches?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20556808">
          <div id="boxatt20556808" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23975376">
              <a id="link_23975376" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=DLBC" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23975376,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22516376}); ">
               Dictionary of Literary Biography Complete Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides authoritative biographical and critical essays on the lives, works, and careers of the world's most influential literary figures from all eras and genres.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17031538">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031538">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031538">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books (in Spanish and English), including full-length biographies and primary documents?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031538">
          <div id="boxatt17031538" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20633917">
              <a id="link_20633917" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20633917,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25297996">
              <a id="link_25297996" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25297996,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24880846}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To peak inside books before requesting on interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17031483">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031483">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031483">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate peer-reviewed (scholarly) journal articles (in Spanish and English)?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031483">
          <div id="boxatt17031483" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20078784">
              <a id="link_20078784" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20078784,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly. English only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20078708">
              <a id="link_20078708" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20078708,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our catalog to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text. Good for Spanish-language.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20078796">
              <a id="link_20078796" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20078796,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to historical research about Latin America and Spain. English and Spanish.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20078801">
              <a id="link_20078801" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=LCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20078801,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717125}); ">
               Literature Criticism Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Reprints of book chapters and journal articles, all full text. A bit clunky to search. Available by library purchase.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20633929">
              <a id="link_20633929" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20633929,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Advanced Spanish Conversation &amp; Composition ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456735}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4630948" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17031484">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17031484">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17031484">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17031484">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Trexler Library's Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17031484" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17366435">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17366435">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17366435">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17366428">
          <p>
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           </a>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17366428" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
